de.iss.mv2.server.data

Class DatabaseContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.iss.mv2.server.io.sql.DefaultSQLContext
      • de.iss.mv2.server.io.sql.SequentialSQLContext
        • de.iss.mv2.server.data.DatabaseContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SQLContext

    public class DatabaseContext
extends SequentialSQLContext
    Provides a SQLContext to connect to the servers database.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static DatabaseContext instance
      Holds the database context to use during the current execution.

      • createConnection

        private static java.sql.Connection createConnection(java.lang.String host,
                                                    int port,
                                                    java.lang.String databse,
                                                    java.lang.String username,
                                                    java.lang.String password)
                                             throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Creates a SQL connection to the specified PostgreSQL host.
        Parameters:
        host - The address of the host.
        port - The port of the host.
        databse - The database to connect to.
        username - The userame to use.
        password - The password to use.
        Returns:
        An open connection to the specified host.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - If the connection can not be created.
